name: credit-analyzer-pro
description: Comprehensive credit analysis and financial guidance application

scripts.build: npm run build:web && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:web && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:web && npm run lint:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd web && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../mobile && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install

author: Avery Lyndell Fuller
